Text:
John, Thank you for uploading this (although I didn't download it). Without you doing so, I'd have not known or heard what Noam had to say. As much as I like his intellectualism, some of the things he says worry me a little. He sometimes seems to be towing the political line (right or left) but, he has a way of delivering the message. His greatest work (IMO) will always be "Manufacturing Consent." 

Again, Thank You!
